text: The 2017–18 season was Puskás FC's 4th competitive season, 1st consecutive season in the OTP Bank Liga and 7th year in existence as a football club. ==First team squad== As of 1 February, 2018. ===Out on loan=== https://www.pfla.hu/?q=team/view ==Transfers== ===Summer=== In: Out: http://www.nemzetisport.hu/labdarugo_nb_i/nb-i-nyari-atigazolasok-2017-2571123 ==Statistics== ===Appearances and goals=== :Last updated on 23 September 2017. |- |colspan="14"|Youth players: |- |colspan="14"|Out to loan: |- |colspan="14"|Players no longer at the club: |} ===Top scorers=== Includes all competitive matches.
